thread.title: Mark Hennessy
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Mark Hennessy

author: Mark Hennessy
title: Mark Hennessy
text:
I came across Otticanet through a google search and was immediately drawn to their great prices. But price isnt always the only thing.
So was so happy to get not only a great price , but great online help and speedy delivery of my sunglasses.
I had some problems with receiving my email confirmation after I ordered and the online help, were awesome in ensuring I got the email even though I didnt have an order number.
The glasses arrived about 7 days after I ordered them.
So I would highly recommend Otticanet based on my experience.
